content.text: Savewith a NBCUniversal ProfileCreate your free profile or log in to save this articleFeb. 16, 2023, 12:34 PM ESTNBC News NOW is a streaming network from NBC News. NOW features deep reporting, thoughtful storytelling, and live, breaking news from the global resources of NBC News. Get the latest breaking news and stay on top of the stories that matter most.Listen to more audio by subscribing to MSNBC and NBC News podcasts.
